The Intelligence Foundation Charity, a nonprofit organization, fosters a vector for intellectual and technical innovation in the individuals who will shape the arts, the sciences and the humanities of the 21st Century The Intelligence Foundation involves formal mind training, formal instruction and full and fair presentation of the facts. The dedicated women, men, universities, agencies and fortune 500 corporations cooperating to fulfill our charitable mission constitute the Intelligence Foundation Community.
